string.name: register_now
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q1. What will be the mode of training?
A1. It will be conducted in Online Mode.
Q2. What is the fees of training?
A2. It will be different for each course. Check it on the official website
Q3. In how much time will the query be rectified?
A3. It will be rectified within 24 hours.
Q4. Can I get an extension in my training if i am unable to finish it within deadline?
A4. You will get an extra week in case you are unable to finish it in given timeframe.
